Articles.Content:
When I am building a rocket I can get the Redux UI to show up. I can click on the square icon to turn it on and off. I can also use \ to make it invisible. However, when I go to launch there is no UI for Engineer. Clicking on the little square Redux button in the top right corner does nothing and \ does nothing.

What happened to the info I used to get while I was in flight?

You need a Kerbal Engineer part attached to the ship, or a config file adding its functionality to every capsule.

There's a mod called Stock Plugins, that adds does this to you: it adds the functionality of many mods (which you still need to install!) to stock parts, so you don't need to install new parts with utility mods (like Engineer, kOS and ScanSAT, for example).
There's a setting you have to turn on, it's called "partless".

There's a setting you have to turn on, it's called "partless".

FIXED! Thank you very much.
